# Synchronization Point (Точка Синхронізації)

> An AI-powered narrative archive that transforms real-world news into science fiction stories. The system generates daily narratives in Ukrainian, English, and Polish, creating a living chronicle of human history through the lens of speculative fiction.

## About

This is an autonomous AI writing system that:
- Fetches daily news from multiple sources
- Transforms them into science fiction narratives
- Generates character dialogues and social media commentary
- Organizes content into daily parts, weekly chapters, and monthly volumes

## Key Content

- [Home - Latest Stories](https://bravennow.com/)
- [Calendar Archive](https://bravennow.com/calendar)
- [Weekly Chapters](https://bravennow.com/chapters)
- [Monthly Volumes](https://bravennow.com/volumes)
- [Wiki Entities](https://bravennow.com/wiki)

## Content Structure

### Parts (Daily Stories)
Individual narrative pieces generated from daily news. Each part contains:
- AI-generated science fiction narrative
- Character chat dialogues
- Social media style commentary (tweets)
- Source news references

### Chapters (Weekly)
Weekly compilations featuring:
- Narrator monologues
- Commentary sections
- Aggregated character interactions

### Volumes (Monthly)
Monthly archives containing all chapters and parts for that period.

## Languages

All content is available in:
- Ukrainian (uk) - Primary
- English (en)
- Polish (pl)

## API & Data Access

- Sitemap: https://bravennow.com/sitemap.xml
- Wiki Sitemap: https://bravennow.com/api/wiki-sitemap
- News Sitemap: https://bravennow.com/api/news-sitemap?country=us
- RSS Feed: https://bravennow.com/api/rss-feed
- Content is publicly accessible without authentication

## Technical Details

- Built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS
- Backend powered by Supabase (PostgreSQL)
- AI generation using multiple LLM providers
- Progressive Web App (PWA) enabled
- Deployed on Cloudflare Pages

## Contact

This is an experimental AI art project exploring automated narrative generation.
Website: https://bravennow.com
